author: Manuel Zamorez
comment: First off, let me say this is a must-have for building a competitive team or just looking for those hard-to-find Pokémon.  But as of right now, it does not have updated info for ULTRA Sun & Moon. I'd like to know when we can expect this stuff to be added?

author: Lelouch vi Britannia
comment: Interface looks really cool. However, there are minor bugs present like the navigation when you are trying to view a particular pokemon and its move set. Then, when you press back it takes you to the 1st pokemon info on the list which is Bulbasaur. It's annoying since scrolling is a bit slow. I wouldn't mind spending $2 if you add map feature. Hope you do.
It works slow, way too many menus to get to your information and very clunky and cluttered layout! First make your app function properly, then focus on the beauty of your UI!

Absolutely love this app rly helpful. My only thing is that you cannot look at Pokemon stats or possible moves when trying to team build so I have to go back and forth which can be quite tedious. But overall best app for team building by far

author: Seth Allwein
comment: It is probably the best pokedex app I've ever seen.... The facts at the start, the different filters help too. It tells you moves and shows you stuff like level or how to evolve, shiny forms, gender different forms, and much more. It is truly remarkable. Hopefully you can do 7th gen shiny/gender forms and 3D versions of them? Gym and trainer details would be fine, also an item list is at the top of my worries, I never remember what items there are and especially what they do. Also this is a minor detail but for the team builder can you make it to where you can decide what ball they're in please? Thank you.

author: RekRoach
comment: Amazing. Easily the best app on Android. There are a few names that aren't correct in English but they are correct and we understand what it means so that's no worry. Absolutely brilliant, waiting for Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon to appear so we can get a nice new update. Keep it up!

author: Casey Gray
comment: The app is kind of okay. Looking up info on a Pokemon, it can do that. The only problem I had was every time I had to type something. It doesn't respond right away when I touch the search bar. I would touch it and wonder if I did it right.

author: Vincent Geist
comment: Decent app. My main issue is that the touch interface is a little iffy, so when I go to log my pokedex, I'll either select the wrong pokemon, or tag one as captured, and the one above/below at the same time.

author: Connor Patterson
comment: I enjoy the app and I'm definitely debating using it as my main app. The only problem is, there are no item pages. You should add items, what they do, and where to find them. I'll rate 5 if ya do 😉

author: wwm31999
comment: It is amazing!! The only complaints are that some of the cries are outdated or are their original forms cries. The sprites are also outdated(not the biggest problem)

author: bapi dey
comment: Best pokedex. I am a poke master in my school. Every problem related to above comes to me. It helps me very much to become popular. But one thing you need to fix: Team builder. Having problems with that. Overall, good app.

author: Angela Cronin
comment: Obnoxious and poorly designed. Sometimes you have to hit a button multiple times to make it do anything. Search is broken. I have no idea why this is so highly rated.

author: SANJAY BANSAL
comment: PLS PLS IMPROVE THE PICTURE QUALITY OF ALL POKEMONS ... ALSO ADD GYM LEADER/ELITE FOUR INFORMATION OF ALL REGIONS & GAMES... ALSO ADD THE LOCATIONS FOR ITEMS & POKEMONS ..... I WILL GIVE U 5* AFTER UPDATING ABOVE ... RATHER THAN ABOVE LACK ITS NICE ....

author: Falconn Break
comment: Amazing app. Everything runs smoothly, great organization. There are a few glitches here and there, but that is too be expected. Highly recommend! :3

author: Devin Kennedy
comment: Really good for finding Pokémon information. The only problem is in team builder, if you put the same Pokémon twice in a row, it copies the same set as the previous one.

author: JadeQueen47
comment: I downloaded this app only for the teambuilder feature and found it very innacurate. Please save your time and use better teambuilder options like pokemon showdown.

I liked it so much the only problem I had was that it did not have dawn wings necrozma (necrozma fused with lunala),dusk main necrozma (necrozma fused with solgaleo),or ultra necrozma (the ultimate form of necrozma).and also on some of the pokedex things on the picture it is just a question mark.if you ad in that stuff I will rate it five stars

author: Nageswararao Annepu
comment: The best pokedex I have ever seen.but the stuff of ultra sun& ultra moon must be added then I would love it. Wonderful for team builder;catch rater;item,ability info;games information; special dexes. GREAT

author: Pokémon FNaF Plush Productions
comment: It's great when I don't know what a pokemon is this will tell me also it has the crys but 1 improvement when the pokemon do thier cry they do an animation

author: Gian Tristian Apostol
comment: Please add the gym leaders and elite four and also please let alolan forms and mega-evolved Pokémon be added to favorites or added to the caught list.
title: It's okay but I have a suggestion.

author: Marcus Reuss
comment: It is very easy to use.  Could you please add a DV checker and a DV to IV calculator for gen 1 shiny hunts?

author: Animated Senpai
comment: This app has everything I need when I can't remember everything for pokemon.

author: prayag kumar sah
comment: It is really awesome app believe it . Man it has all pokemon with the latest details it's update is verrrrrrrrrry useful it's graphics is improved.best

author: Zubair Ahmed
comment: Excellent 3d effect,would be better if Mega evolutions and generation 7 pokemon also have 3d effects

author: Shrio Berserk
comment: Awesome ..a suggestion if u could arrange moves according to their type and their damage listed ..it would be more better

author: Equalizer Rayem
comment: Nice pokedex but you guys should add a Z-move Section so that we can know about which Pokemon can know which moves and show us the real move aswell...But pretty nice...😉😉😉

author: Luke Fowler
comment: The PocketDex is definitely the best app I have on my phone, it's very useful for team making, checklist, catch rates, and info on the game series. Would love to see Ultra Sun and Moon get added if there's a new update coming up.

author: teamskull froakie 0674
comment: This is awsome app I love it me and my friend did a role play and acted like our phones were a pomedex

author: Saad TBC
comment: It has every kind of information but to improve it you gotta add information about gym leaders elite fours and pokemon masters we've got to battle of all 7 regions

author: Gary Andre Kasbarian
comment: Contain the shiny versions of Pokemon with flavors and Alolan and Mega evolutions. You are not the only Pokedex with Gen 7. Even the Official Internet Pokedex has Gen 7. And add UB-Burst, UB-Assembly, and UB-Adhesive as well as dusk form Lycanroc and the two new Necrozma formes.

author: Focus XY
comment: Working great so far! But needs to update for Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon eg. Lycanroc Dusk Form should be added. The sooner the app is updated is the sooner I'll give a 5*. Thank you! Continue to do great stuff!

author: OnlyTwoShoes
comment: It's been almost a year since the last update and you still haven't enabled the "Caught" tag for Alola variant pokemon.

author: joshua Del Valle
comment: Well yah it's good but the design and information is wee bit short so improve it and BOOM five stars.

author: Ashok Rathod
comment: If we can make teams then there should be a battle mod and Ultra Sun and Ultra moon should be added

author: Need4Games 1577
comment: This is probably the best pokedex I've found so far. It has all the Info I need right in the palm of my hands. Thanks for spending the time to make this! 😀

author: TACOCAT !
comment: Honestly I never even yoused the app. It kept saying poketdex keeps on stopping.

author: Leonardo Soller
comment: I think it's pretty good, they just need to fix the IV and EV Dexs even though they're pointless. Anyways Thanks  Pa, fix your friggin Calculaters

author: Serina Durrah
comment: I like it but one thing Woobat doesn't have a level for when it evolves

author: Derik McAlister
comment: This pokedex app is the best, now I can outsmart my friends with pokemon facts!

author: Mia
comment: This app is really good, but I'm having problems with opening it. Whenever I open it, it just closes on me and it won't let me open it at all.
